title: Documentary Spotlights 'Wrecking Crew' Behind Hits of '60s, '70s
teaser: Director Denny Tedesco began filming in 1996 when his father, Wrecking Crew guitarist Tommy Tedesco, was diagnosed with cancer. Many of the people he talked to, including his father, have since died.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
